tasks.label: Build (UCRT64) - Console
args: export MSYSTEM=UCRT64; export CHERE_INVOKING=1; export PATH=/c/msys64/ucrt64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin:$PATH; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; mkdir -p build; g++ -std=c++17 -g -Idomain -Iutils ilctool.cpp -o build/ilctool.exe

tasks.label: Build wxApp (UCRT64)
args: export MSYSTEM=UCRT64; export CHERE_INVOKING=1; export PATH=/c/msys64/ucrt64/bin:/c/msys64/usr/bin:$PATH; cd "${workspaceFolder}"; mkdir -p build; g++ -std=c++17 -g -Idomain -Iutils ilctool.cpp -o build/wxapp.exe $(wx-config --cxxflags --libs) -mwindows
